About.Title: About Us
About.Description:
Kávészem Bt. has been at your service for over 24 years, specializing in the rental of coffee machines. We are proud to work with more than 100 partners every day.
With our reliable coffee machines and expertise, we guarantee an excellent quality coffee experience for our clients, whether it is a small business or a larger hospitality unit. Our goal is to meet our clients' needs and contribute to their business success.
Be part of the coffee experience and let us take care of your coffee machine needs and issues!

Services.Title: Our Services
Services.Description:
Rental of coffee machines tailored to your needs
Service within 24 hours for our partners
Coffee beans of your choice included in the price

Machines.Title: Our Machines
Machines.Description:
Lever espresso machines with all accessories (available in 1 and 2 lever versions)
Capsule coffee machines (available in 1 and 2 head versions)
Tabletop beverage dispensers
Automatic coffee machines (for less than 50 servings per day)
High durability machines for Party Service

Pricing.Title: Pricing
Pricing.Description:
Post-consumption billing structure
You can use our service with as little as 0 Ft investment capital
Our prices include the rental of the machine, the coffee used, and any necessary service
No extra operating fees or hidden costs!
